definitions.definition: A small, hard object, in the shape of a pebble , that sometimes forms in the gallbladder or bile duct ; composed of cholesterol , bile pigments and calcium salts .

main_definition: ( biology , medicine ) A small, hard object, in the shape of a pebble , that sometimes forms in the gallbladder or bile duct ; composed of cholesterol , bile pigments and calcium salts .
